name: makeoo
description: エコフレンドリーDIYプラットフォーム - フルスタックWebアプリケーション

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:docker" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:docker: docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d mysql redis phpmyadmin adminer redis-commander
scripts.dev:backend:mock: cd backend && cp .env.no-docker .env && npm run dev
scripts.dev:db: docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d mysql phpmyadmin
scripts.dev:cache: docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d redis redis-commander
scripts.dev:all: docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml down -v && docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run db:setup && npm run db:seed

author: Makeoo Development Team
